name: bonita-web-api
description: Open API Specification for Bonita Platform.

scripts.yaml: copyfiles -u 2 docs/images/* dist/static/images/ && redocly bundle -o dist/openapi.yaml -f
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run yaml
scripts.postman: npm run build && node_modules/.bin/openapi2postmanv2 -s dist/openapi.yaml -o dist/postman.json -p
scripts.static: redoc-cli build ./dist/openapi.yaml -t docs/index.html.hbs --cdn -o ./dist/static/index.html && copyfiles -u 1 dist/openapi.yaml dist/static && copyfiles -u 1 dist/postman.json dist/static
scripts.package: npm test && npm run postman && npm run static && cd dist/static && zip -r ../static.zip *
